class.name: GenericMatrixOps

javadoc.text: Returns true if the provided matrix is has a value of 1 along the diagonal * elements and zero along all the other elements.
javadoc.param: tol How close to zero or one each element needs to be.
javadoc.return: If it is within tolerance to an identity matrix.
